text:
Just because you are outside of Northamptonshire it doesn't mean you can get away with flytipping. 
The @EnvAgency have all sorts of methods at their disposal. It's time to #ScrapFlytipping https://t.co/P97xy80ktH
RT @AndynBrown16: Sadly #flood #forecast for the weekend has worsened. Low likelihood of significant impacts from surface water & river. @E‚Ä¶
RT @mattadamw: With water pollution incidents rising, and not a single river, lake or stream meeting good chemical status according to rece‚Ä¶

@mattadamw @EnvAgency Absolutely. Ditching the criteria of the WFD seems like a bid to make our rivers appear cleaner than they are to reach targets and to absolve responsibility. Raw sewage was released into our rivers for the equivalent of 1.5 million hours last year - how is this acceptable?!

RT @Feargal_Sharkey: Another day another @EnvAgency failure.

Four out of nine water companies in England are now rated as poor when it com‚Ä¶

With water pollution incidents rising, and not a single river, lake or stream meeting good chemical status according to recent @EnvAgency data, it's time to seriously increase investment in restoring the health of our blue environments. h/t @hannahsrudd https://t.co/dH4bWqKsLG

RT @EnvAgency: More stormy weather is expected this weekend across southern parts of England

https‚Ä¶
